Description: Papyrus (in fragmentary condition) written with black ink with demotic legal text on recto (5 ll.), verso blank. Thompson's MS Catalogue: "conveyance (?) of an alimony (sanx) and some house or land of which the boundaries remain in part. Date Ptolemaic. Origin Fayum (?)".
Curator's comments: Text: published in Lüddeckens, Demotische Urkunden aus Hawara, Stuttgart, 1998 (as well as a number of other BM papyri). Cf. entry in www.trismegistos.org - DAHT.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (2744) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/2744)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: stained, fractured, loss Black ink Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
Acquisition notes: Purchased from M. Nahman. Cf. the additional sheets at the end of Thompson's MS Catalogue, titled "B.M. Nahman Papyri (1923)".
